name: Trash game (azigames)
description:
This game - Trash game - was made to encourage people to donate to a fundraiser called #teamseas which has a goal of removing 30 million pounds of trash from the ocean before 2022.

In the game, you have 2 minutes to remove all the the trash from the ocean with your submarine. Good luck, kiddo!

Go check out my YouTube channel where I'll most likely upload a video on how I made this game!
